Container.Name: Bookshelf-Traveller
Container.Overview:
A simple discord bot that allows you to listen to your audiobooks and manage your audiobookshelf (ABS) server.
For the full guide, please visit the bookshelf-traveller repository.
Container.Requires: This requires an audiobookshelf server and a discord application token.
Container.Changes: ### 2024-08-13 #### Breaking Change - Version 1.2.2 has a new tasks.db structure, you'll need to manually delete or change to a new path. ### 2024-08-10 New Features: - HTTPX overhaul, all have been converted to async functions with client sessions. - New book check command added - Hot fix applied for recent discord api silent breaking change. (Error 4020) - A bunch of other minor fixes and improvements! :)

Config.Name: Bookshelf Token
Config.Description: ABS Token, generated in the settings page of the user. Accepts all user types, but will have limitations if not admin.

Config.Name: Persistant DB
Config.Description: Path for db(s) to stay persistant. Delete if you want the docker to re-initialize the dbs everytime it starts up.

Config.Name: Owner Only
Config.Description: Only the owner will have access to all commands. Disable to allow others to use the bot.

Config.Name: Enable Audio Playback
Config.Description: By default is true, enables the audio module. If disabled, it will remove the ability for audio playback.

Config.Name: Default Search Provider
Config.Description: Default search provider for titles. Please refer to ABS API wiki page for full list. EXPERIMENTAL AND OPTIONAL

Config.Name: Enable Audio Playback
Config.Description: By default is true, enables the audio module. If disabled, it will remove the ability for audio playback.

Config.Name: Playback Role
Config.Description: Playback Role. Can be copied over from discord when developer mode is enabled.

Config.Name: Multi-User
Config.Description: Enables multi-user login to ABS server. Disable to allow admin controls.

Config.Name: HTTPS Image URL
Config.Description: Used if you want to use HTTPS connection to retrieve your images. Note this won't do anything if you are already using it in the primary URL.

Config.Name: Debug Mode
Config.Description: Will make log verbose and show all internal library logs as well.
